physical_examinations.relevant_findings: The patient was vitally stable and afebrile. The patient is comfortable and sitting up, not in pain or discomfort. He is oriented to the time of the day only but not to place, year. Neck supple, no lymphadenopathy detected. Normal S1 & S2, no murmurs. Equal full air entry bilaterally with no crepitation, wheeze, or rhonchi. Scar at the lumbar spine area. Multiple scars noted with keloid formation on abdomen; abdomen soft and non-tender on palpation, no organomegaly or ascites. No edema, dry skin on both legs.
